hero.name: Roland Nemes
hero.summary: Entry-level DevOps Engineer with strong skills in AWS, Kubernetes, Linux systems administration, and automation, backed by a Master’s degree in Translation & Interpretation and a Bachelor’s degree in English Language & Literature. Experienced in designing and automating cloud infrastructure deployments, optimizing CI/CD workflows, and building production-ready applications. Actively developing BaseCAT, a professional Computer-Assisted Translation (CAT) tool using Next.js, Electron, and MongoDB, showcasing full-stack architecture capabilities. Adept at bridging development and operations to deliver scalable, high-quality engineering solutions.
hero.location: Based in Romania / EU – open to remote or hybrid roles in Hungary & Romania.

list.title: DevOps & Cloud

list.title: AWS EKS Deployment Automation
list.description: This project delivers a robust AWS CloudFormation template for deploying a scalable Kubernetes (EKS) cluster. It features integrated Prometheus and Grafana monitoring, and a fully automated CI/CD pipeline using AWS CodePipeline and GitHub. The solution enables zero-downtime deployments and scalable infrastructure provisioning, making it ideal for production environments.

list.title: BaseCAT – CAT Tool (In Dev)
list.description: BaseCAT is a professional Computer-Assisted Translation tool designed for translators and language professionals. Built with Next.js, Electron, and MongoDB, it offers secure authentication, project management, termbase and translation memory import/export, and a persistent tabbed interface for efficient workflow.
features: Project management: creation, dashboard, details editing, archiving, recycle bin
Document import and HTML conversion with Pandoc for in-app preview
Persistent tabbed interface (projects, documents, dashboard) with sidebar navigation
Auto-login with hashed tokens restored on restart

list.title: Reddit Clone (Full-Stack App)
list.description: A full-stack Reddit-style web application built with NextJS and SQLite. Features include user authentication, post creation, commenting, and a modern, responsive UI.

list.title: E-Commerce Application
list.description: A NodeJS-based e-commerce backend built with Express. Includes product management, shopping cart, and checkout functionality, designed for scalability and easy integration with frontend frameworks.

list.title: Arch Linux Bootstrapper
list.description: A Bash-based automation script that streamlines the installation and setup of Arch Linux. Designed for advanced users, it reduces setup time and ensures a consistent environment.

list.title: Dotfiles & Configurations
list.description: A collection of personal dotfiles and configuration scripts for Linux and development environments. Includes settings for shell, editors, and various tools to boost productivity.
